options: Kutamukuramo keretse mugihe hari ibyago byaterwa n'inkongi y'umuriro cyangwa  akaba ashobora kugongwa n'ikindi kinyabiziga no guhamagara ababishinzwe
Gusaba uwakomeretse kunyeganyeza ibice by'umubiri kugirano umenye aho  ibikomere bye bigarukira
question: Ni ubuhe buryo bwiza bwakurikizwa igihe hari umuntu wakomerekeye mu mpanuka  yo mu muhanda ?
Imodoka zikoreshwa nk'amavatiri y'ifasi cyangwa amatagisi zifite uburemere bwemewe  butarenga kg 3500 zigira umuvuduko ntarengwa ungana gute?
Mu mihanda yo mu mijyi ubwikorezi ntarengwa bwemewe kuri buri mutambiko  usanzwe ufungirwaho ibiziga bine ni:

options: ibinyabiziga bidapakiye kdi bitajya birenza umuvuduko wa km 25 mu isaha  ahateganye
ibinyabiziga bya police bijya ahatarenga km 25 uvuye aho biba
A na B ni ibisubizo by'ukuri
question: Ibiziga by'ibinyabiziga bigendeshwa na moteri n'ibya velomoteri kimwe n'ibya  romoruki zabyo bigomba kuba byambaye inziga zihagwa zifite amano n'ubujyakuzimu  butari munsi ya milimetero imwe ku migongo yabyo yose, n'ubudodo bwabyo  ntibugire ahantu na hamwe bugaragara kdi ntibigire aho byacitse bikomeye mu  mpande zabyo. Ariko ibyo ntibikurikizwa ku binyabiziga bikurikira:

options: Guhagarika ibinyabiziga bindi no kubasaba ubufasha
A na b ni ibisubizo by'ukuri
question: Ugeze ahabereye impanuka yo mumuhanda bwambere ugasanga abakomeretse  bikomeye. wakiriza icyarimwe amatara y'ibyerekezo byombi, niki kindi  ushobora gukora?
Ishusho y'icyapa kivuga "ugukikira" bitegetswe ni :
N'uwuhe muntu ushobora gusimbura ibimenyetso byo mumuhanda, dutegetswe  kubaha?
Umuvuduko ntarengwa muri iyi nzira nyabagendwa ungana ute?
Umuyobozi ugenda mu muhanda igihe ubugari bwawo budatuma anyuranaho nta  nkomyi ashobora kunyura mu kayira k'abanyamaguru ariko amaze kureba ibi  bikurikira:
Ugeze ahari inzira yabanyamaguru barindiriye kwambuka. Ntibatangiye kwambuka ,  wakora iki?

options: Hanyurwa n'ibinyabiziga bifite imitambiko itatu gusa
question: Iki cyapa gisobanura iki ?
Ibimenyetso bigenga uburyo bwo kugendera mu muhanda birimo ibyiciro bingahe?
Icyapa cyerekana uburebure bw'igice cyatera ibyago cyangwa bw'ahantu amabwiriza  y'icyo cyapa agomba gukurikizwa kirangwa n'ubuso n'ibimenyetso bikurikira:
Iki cyapa gisobanura iki?

options: Umuyobozi w'ikinyabiziga ashobora kunyuranaho arenze umurongo wera  udacagaguye
Umuyobozi w'ikinyabiziga abujijwe kunyuranaho arenze imirongo yera
Abayobozi b'ibinyamitende gusa bemerewe kunyuranaho barenze umurongo wera  udacagaguye
question: Mu gihe utwaye ikinyabiziga uva kuri A ugana kuri B, Iki kimenyetso kiri mu muhanda  kivuze iki ?

options: Umuyobozi w'ikinyabiziga agomba kuguma mu ruhande rw'iburyo kugira ngo ahe  inzira umumotari
Umuyobozi w'ikinyabiziga agomba gutanga inzira ayiha umu motari
question: Nk'umuyobozi w'ikinyabiziga, n'iyihe myitwarire wagira?

options: Guhagarara hanyuma ukagenda gake gake witonze kugezaho ureba neza.
Kwihuta wegera imbere aho ushobora kureba ugafunga ikindi cyerekezo
Gutegereza abanyamaguru bakakumenyesha ko ntakibazo wakata
Guhindukiza imodoka vuba kugirango ushake indi nzira wakoresha.
question: Utegereje gukata iburyo kwiherezo ry'umuhanda.ukingirijwe nimodoka ihagaze.niki  wakora?

options: Ku gisate kiri iburyo bw'umuhanda gusa
question: Ni hehe byemewe kunyuranaho munzira y'icyerekezo kimwe?

options: Uguhinguka ku mwaro cyangwa ku nkombe cyangwa ahegereye icyome
question: Iki cyapa gisobanura iki?

options: Kugumana umuvuduko wari ufite ukamuvugiriza ihoni
question: Utwaye ikinyabiziga inyuma ya romoruki.umuyobozi wayo akaguha ikimenyetso cyo  kumutambukaho iburyo kandi ugana ibumoso, wakora iki ?
